      • reservate

        public static java.lang.String[][] reservate(java.lang.String[][] seats,
                                             int seatStart,
                                             int seatEnd,
                                             int row,
                                             java.lang.String name,
                                             int id)
        The reservate is the menu thats calculate the seats the customer wanna book and call's the method that saves it in the database
        Parameters:
        name - This is the customers name
        id - This is the movie ID
        seats - This is the seats 2d Array.
        row - This is the inputted row the customer wanna sit on
        seatStart - This is the first seat the customer wanna buy on inputted row
        seatEnd - This is the last seat the customer wanna buy on inputted row
        Returns:
        The reservate seats object.

      • checkAvailability

        public static boolean checkAvailability(java.lang.String[][] seats,
                                        int row,
                                        int seatStart,
                                        int seatEnd)
        The checkAvailability method checks if the seats is available or not.
        Parameters:
        seats - This is the seats 2d Array.
        row - This is the inputted row the customer wanna sit on
        seatStart - This is the first seat the customer wanna buy on inputted row
        seatEnd - This is the last seat the customer wanna buy on inputted row
        Returns:
        a boolean if those seats are available or not.
